means: 紧固件( fastener的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: These earrings snap on with special fasteners.
sentence.Network_cn: 这副耳环是用特制的按扣扣上去的.

sentence.Network_en: If you haven't got the special fasteners to fix your photographs into the book, you'll have to gum them on.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果没有专用的固定物把相片固定在相册中的话, 你就得用胶水粘.

sentence.Network_en: A manufacturer has an automatic machine that produces fasteners.
sentence.Network_cn: 某制造商有一台生产拉链的自动设备.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the company does its best for the manufacture and sell of fasteners and it professionally produces various types of hex nuts. these products are sold and abroad with high quality .本公司致力于各种紧固件的生产加工和销售经营，专业生产加工各种规格型号的紧固件螺帽，产品销往海内外，经营十余年来，信誉良好，质量保证。
shanghai hangtou fasteners co. , ltd ., 上海航头标准件有限公司.
Torque wrenches offer the precision measurement needed to tighten fasteners ., 力矩扳手可以提供禁锢螺栓所须的精确力矩计量.
a manufacturer has an automatic machine that produces fasteners .某制造商有一台生产拉链的自动设备。

entry.tran: (尤指衣服上的)扣子，拉链，钩扣，紧固物，扣件
entry.def: A fastener is a device such as a button, zip, or small hook that fastens something, especially clothing.

auth_sentence.content: These fasteners include a locking mechanism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These fasteners include a locking mechanism.

auth_sentence.content: By using velcro fasteners, the underwear does not require the wearer to bend over either to put them on remove them.
auth_sentence.res_content: By using velcro fasteners, the underwear does not require the wearer to bend over either to put them on remove them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By using velcro fasteners, the underwear does not require the wearer to bend over either to put them on remove them.

auth_sentence.content: Lightning can damage the fuselage, scorch portions of the nose or wings, and even pop fasteners on the skin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lightning can damage the fuselage, scorch portions of the nose or wings, and even pop fasteners on the skin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lightning can damage the fuselage, scorch portions of the nose or wings, and even pop fasteners on the skin.
